channel.title: Withdraw All Bug
channel.description: Hey guys, I was wondering, if anyone knows how to make a fix for withdraw all? When a player does withdraw all, and they don't have enough space in their inventory, it fills up the inventory but all the items in the bank disappear. I am using 317 delta source

item.title: Withdraw All Bug
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

Find the Bank all items packet. In the packet processing logic there will be an interface check for the bank, just before you see anything like addItem(id, amt) do a check to see if the person has enough space first. You could then even add capping, to add as much as possible (like in actual runescape) and leave the rest banked.

Read full topic
